title: Looking for someone good with WordPress and has Dev Op Skills and you will get paid for it!
body: so as some of you may have noticed the site is still down the guy who does my hosting has been trying for two days but isnt having much luck past securing the database and a few other things  if youre great with wp stuff and wouldnt mind lending a hand or know someone like this please feel free to message me or respond here youd definitely get paid for this though how much is a question of what the guy who does my hosting thinks  thanks

title: Abolish Work is Down (But not Out)
